content: snowflake written crochet pdf pattern in english us terminology in ukrainian no charts or photos the pattern consists of 7 rounds for this project you need - cotton yarn 50 g / 1 76 oz / 185 yards / 169 m per skein - 2 5 mm hook you can use any thread or yarn and the corresponding hook yardage 16 yards / 15 m finished size 4 / 10 cm if you have any questions feel free to contact me
